mapper.insert: insert into orders(id, member_id , departure_date, payment_date, status , amount , destination_id, cigarette_amount, drink_amount, perfume_amount) values(order_id_seq.nextval, #{memberId}, sysdate, sysdate, 0 , #{amount} , 1,2,0,0)
insert into orders_detail(item_id, orders_id , store_id, quantity) values(#{itemId}, order_id_seq.currval, #{storeId}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: select distinct O.id ordersId, S.id storeId , D.detail_status status , O.amount amount , M.name memberName , O.payment_date paymentDate from orders_detail D , orders O ,store S , member M where O.id = D.orders_id and D.store_id = S.id and M.id = O.member_id and S.id = #{storeId}

select I.name itemName , I.price price, O.member_id memberId ,O.id orderId , M.name memberName from orders_detail D , orders O , item I , member M where D.orders_id = O.id and I.id = D.item_id and M.id = O.member_id and O.id = #{orderId} and I.store_id = #{storeId}
mapper.update: update orders_detail set detail_status = 1 where store_id = #{storeId} and orders_id=#{orderId}
update orders_detail set detail_status = 2 where store_id = #{storeId} and orders_id=#{orderId}
update orders_detail set detail_status = 3 where store_id = #{storeId} and orders_id=#{orderId}
update orders set status = (select min(detail_status) from orders_detail where orders_id = #{orderId}) where id=#{orderId}
mapper.select: select O.id orderId ,M.name memberName , payment_date paymentDate, O.amount amount, status from orders O, member M where O.member_id = M.id and O.id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where item_id = #{itemId} and member_id = #{memberId}
